relic.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: an old object or custom that reminds people of the past or that has lived on from a past time
relic.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Roman relics found in a field

relic.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a part of the body or clothing of a holy person which is kept after their death because it is thought to be holy
